description.selection: React + Vite template optimized for client-heavy applications. Includes Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, and Cloudflare Workers backend support. Best for SPAs, dashboards, and static-heavy applications.
description.usage: Perfect for: Single Page Applications (SPAs), Admin dashboards, Data visualization apps, Client-heavy applications with minimal backend logic, Static content sites with interactive elements

description.selection: Next.js template with SSR/SSG capabilities, React Server Components, and advanced routing. Includes Framer Motion for animations. Ideal for high-performance, SEO-critical applications with complex server-side requirements.
description.usage: Perfect for: E-commerce platforms, Marketing websites, Blogs with SSR, Content-heavy sites requiring SEO, High-performance server-rendered applications, Multi-page applications with complex routing

description.selection: Advanced backend template with multiple Durable Objects, D1 database integration, and complex state management. Supports multi-entity persistence, real-time sync, and server-side business logic. Best for data-intensive applications.
description.usage: Perfect for: CRM systems, Inventory management, Multi-user collaborative apps, Chat applications with persistence, Real-time multiplayer games, Applications requiring complex backend state and database operations

description.selection: Simplified Durable Object template with single DO instance for stateful services. Ideal for real-time features, counters, live dashboards, and applications requiring server-side state without database complexity.
description.usage: Perfect for: Real-time dashboards, Live counters and analytics, WebSocket-based applications, Stateful services without database, Simple multiplayer features, Session management systems

description.selection: AI-first template with Cloudflare Agents SDK, AI Gateway integration, and tool/function calling capabilities. Includes MCP support for extending AI capabilities. Perfect for building intelligent chat applications and AI-powered tools.
description.usage: Perfect for: AI chatbots and assistants, Customer support automation, Code generation tools, Document analysis applications, AI-powered search and recommendation systems, Intelligent data processing tools

description.selection: HTML5 Canvas game template with game loop, input handling, collision detection, and sprite management. Includes example games (endless runner, coin flip, snake). Perfect for 2D browser games and interactive experiences.
description.usage: Perfect for: 2D arcade games, Puzzle games, Endless runners, Card games, Physics-based games, Educational game applications, Interactive animations and visualizations

description.selection: Web3 dApp template with wallet integration, smart contract deployment tools, and OpenZeppelin contract templates (ERC20, ERC721, NFT). Includes Remix IDE integration and contract interaction utilities. Perfect for blockchain applications.
description.usage: Perfect for: DeFi applications, NFT marketplaces, Token launches (ERC20/ERC721), DAO governance platforms, Staking and yield farming apps, Blockchain games with NFTs, Decentralized exchanges (DEX)

description.selection: Production-grade MCP (Model Context Protocol) server template for building AI tool servers on Cloudflare Workers. Features declarative tool definitions, DI architecture, JWT/OAuth auth, pluggable storage (KV/R2), and full observability. Perfect for extending AI assistants with custom tools and capabilities.
description.usage: Perfect for: AI assistant tool servers, LLM function calling backends, Claude/ChatGPT custom tools, Model Context Protocol servers, Edge-deployed AI integrations, Serverless AI tool hosting, Custom AI capability extensions, Multi-model tool orchestration
